results.content: Good course for those folks running Apache or making use of a hosting provider that uses Apache. This is a solid foundational course for WordPress page speed optimization.
results.content_html: Good course for those folks running Apache or making use of a hosting provider that uses Apache. This is a solid foundational course for WordPress page speed optimization.

results.content: The instructor was very knowledgeable; live visuals as he conducted the tests and applied the tools to make improvements.
results.content_html: The instructor was very knowledgeable; live visuals as he conducted the tests and applied the tools to make improvements.

results.content: Thank you for this course, it helped answer a few questions I've been wrestling with! I have been searching for information on improving my site's speed and there's so much out there—not all of which works on my site or is comprehensible. I appreciate what you taught and having it in one place, saving me valuable time. FYI, my site scored well (A A A F B X) prior to implementing what I learned here. Afterward: A A A A B X!  Useful tools were introduced that I will use again (thank you also for those), with enough instruction and detail on how to use them. I would recommend this course to anyone wishing to speed up their site!

I would recommend this course to anyone wishing to speed up their site!

results.content:
Good tips, some of which I already knew. Very concise and to the point. Would have been nice if he could have demonstrated File Optimizer on Windows and also I couldn't follow what he did in chrome with developer mode. He just did it too quickly and I couldn't see what he was clicking on. Also I haven't tested this on my own sites yet. Anyway it was well delivered and I believe it will be useful.
One thing I'd do personally before I try any of these optimizations is to backup my website so if anything breaks, I can reinstall the old version.
